column5: We'll be up at Otter Lake (16 k south of Parry Sound)for a week starting next Saturday. Looking forward to a nice family vacation. Was wondering if you guys know if the fishing is a decent and if you could suggest any locations and tactics- pickerel, bass and pike prefered. The cottage we're renting comes with a 14' aluminum + 10 hp so I can get around the lake if need be.Thanks in advance,Tony
